title: Her Letters - emotions regarding her letters

content.question: In a well-written essay, analyze how Chopin uses literary elements and techniques to convey the woman’s complex emotions regarding her letters.

frqParts.text: In a well-written essay, analyze how Chopin uses literary elements and techniques to convey the woman’s complex emotions regarding her letters.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe what specific textual details reveal about a character, that character's perspective, and that character's motives.
